room_title: Escape room "The Plundering" by Beat the Room in Sacramento
room_description: Set in the 1700’s on a dark and stormy night. The Royal Fortune is anchored and emptied of its crew. You successfully stole Black Bart’s treasure map last time you boarded his ship. Now you and your crew want to plunder his ship again..except this time, they returned unexpectedly. You have 60 minutes to escape the ship before Captain Black Bart and his pirates find you and you’re forced to walk the plank!
